about_the_game:
Become a Legend with nearly everything from the Heroic Riders Pack PLUS two additional exclusive mounts, 24 extra inventory slots, 30 additional days of Premium Service and much more!

With the exception of the Ellun box and the Premium Service, all items will be awarded to each character on the purchasing player’s account. The Ellun Box and Premium Service will be awarded to the first character created on the purchasing player’s account.

The Legendary Riders Pack includes:
* 7-Day Open Beta Head Start
* Closed Beta Access
* Mount: Karios
* Mount: Gyreon
* Mount: Diamond Wolf
* Mount: Amethyst Wolf
* Pet: Warden Rex
* Blood Karios Skin
* Magma Gyreon Skin
* Ruby Wolf Skin
* Topaz Wolf Skin
* Premium Service (60-day)
* Chacha the Cat Shoulder Accessory
* 24-Slot Designer Bag
* Dragon's Might Weapon Skin
* Onyx Order Outfit
* Ellun Box (400)
* Extra Character Slot
* Beautification Voucher
* Title: Hakanas Honorguard
* Generalist Talisman (60-day)
* Defensive Talisman (60-day)
* 100% Health Recovery Potion Box (40)
* 100% Mana Recovery Potion Box (40)

name: Riders of Icarus: Legendary Riders Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista (SP2) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD A8-5500 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 7670 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3GHz or higher / AMD FX-6200 @3.3GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) or better / Radeon HD 6870 (1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit Sound Card

With the exception of the Ellun box and the Premium Service, all items will be awarded to each character on the purchasing player’s account.
supported_languages:
